projects.title: WebGR
projects.description: WebGR is a complete platform for field teams that unifies commercial and technical operations, organizing routes, schedules and processes in a single system.
highlights: Complete field team management with commercial, technical visits and quotes
Management center for managers with CRM, sales funnel and workflows
Integrated mobile app for logging activities, routes and field service
Integrations with ERPs and external services, providing unified and automated operations

metrics.label: Visits Recorded

metrics.description: Sales operations recorded and processed by the system.

projects.title: Hub Intelligence
projects.description: Hub Intelligence is a BI platform that centralizes data from multiple systems and delivers real-time insights with advanced analytics, automated reporting and interactive visualizations.
highlights: Centralizes company data in a single platform
Integrations with multiple ERPs and business systems

metrics.label: Data Integration
metrics.description: Unifies information from ERPs, e-commerce and internal systems into a single dashboard.
